WorkItem.Description:
I downloaded AdventureWorks2008R2, but I cannot get the file to excecute on my laptop. I keep getting this fatal error:
 
Failed object intialization (ISupportInitalize.EndInit). Property FilestreamLevel is not available for Server "[JERMAINESNIPE]'. This property may not exist for this object, or may not be retrievable due to insufficient access right. Error at object "DatabaseSelection' in markup file 'DatabaseInstaller;component/databaseselection.xaml' Line 78 Position 3.
 
Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Comments.Message: I too am getting the same error. Please advice.

I am getting the same error on windows xp professional. I originally installed the sql server on the second hard drive so I uninstalled and put it on the system drive so the default paths would be correct. That didn't help. Error at object 'DatabaseSelection' in markup file 'DatabaseInstaller;component/databaseselection.xaml' Line 78 Position 3.
